title: Rewards
body:
I logged into my league client, and two chest popped up saying i have reward. 
but i dont know how to claim them nor do i know what they are, can anyone help me, please

replies.body:
I wasn't able to find a record of gifts being sent today. This was probably caused by us re-enabling gifting notifications after we resolved the bug with them.

If you have any other questions, let me know. ^.^
ok thank you, ill keep an eye out if it happens again ill be sure to let you know
I also got the notification. It said I received a summoner icon.
i got the same thing it might be a bug
